summary: Highly efficient HR Coordinator with extensive experience in fast-paced administrative environments. Experienced in onboarding, background checks, drug screening, employee relations, performance reviews, and recruitment using Kenexa BrassRing. Proficient with ATS, EEO reporting, HRIS, and Microsoft Office Suite; strong organizational and communication skills.

experience.title: HR Coordinator
experience.description: Responsible for initiating, tracking and follow-up of background checks and drug tests; on-boarding for new employees (I-9 and tour); conducts exit interviews; posts requisitions to careers page and outside job boards; recruits for warehouse, driver and entry level to mid level positions using Kenexa BrassRing; maintains applicant flow logs and AA-EEO spreadsheets; attends college career fairs; initiates and leads Best Practices initiatives; administrator for employee performance review program; reviews managers' submissions of employee performance evaluations; maintains associate personnel files; vouches department bills for payment; other administrative duties as assigned.

experience.title: HR Coordinator
experience.description: Scheduled background checks and drug screens for candidates; compiled and processed expense reports for candidates; communicated with the Hiring Manager about the new hire's first day; administered the new hire associate experience by scheduling their first day's HR session, including reviewing company policies, completing I-9 through E-verify, dispensing WOTC survey, explaining direct deposit, encouraging self-identification (EEO) and demonstrating the company portal; designed and prepared printed HR materials for new hires; point person for SOX compliance for the HR Department; SAP Administration: ran requested reports, created requested reports and entered employee information; planned and managed internal corporate events; events included Take Your Child to Work Day, Wellness Fairs, fund raisers, blood drives, lunch and learns and employee service recognition breakfasts; edited and updated the HR Department's page on the portal using SharePoint software; trained in CPR and first aid; responded to injured associates and dispensed employee injury statements.

experience.title: HR Coordinator
experience.description: Designed and prepared HR materials for new hires; scheduled and administered onboarding; served as point for SOX compliance; performed SAP administration: ran and created reports and entered employee information; planned internal corporate events and maintained HR portal pages; supported employee performance reviews and filing.

experience.title: Receptionist
experience.description: Internship program Recruiter lead for college students; collaborated with company President to determine intern eligibility criteria; posted employment positions to company website; sourced and screened qualified candidates; tracked candidates in Excel; ensured state and federal poster compliance; acted as go-to person for general company knowledge; managed a six-line phone system; updated company phone and employee directory on the portal.
